page.title: 09WALK TO N.CAVE PLAYING FIELD
page.content: My favourite walk in our reference grid is to go down Station Road (ref.895323),up Everthorpe Road past Claire's garden and up to the whispering trees. You then go past the houses until you get to a public footpath which goes through a field and over a stile and into the Playing Fields. Pass by a big oak tree and the pavilion and then enjoy fun on the swings. Carefully across the road and past our picturesque church down to the soft sandy beck. If it's a warm day I recommend a paddle. Now you turn back and return the way you came. This is an enjoyable walk for the dog as well as being pleasant for people from one to eighty.
